page.title: 16RECREATION IN MORETON
page.content: At the{British Legion}there are 550 members. There are parties in the week and weekends. In the skittle leagues they have eight to sixteen teams. They provide darts, cribbage, indoor bowling, whist, bingo, snooker, pool, billiards and dancing for people to occupy themselves with. In the{Black } {Bear Inn}they provide darts, cribbage and there are three different fruit machines. There is a darts league. At the{Recreation Ground}there is an adventure playground for the children to play on. The{cubs and scouts}go camping and canoeing, tracking, badge work and arrow work. There is also a {Brownie}pack and a{Guide}Company.There is a{Youth Club}for 6 to 18 year olds. The Junior club (for 6 to 12 year olds) is held on Wednesdays from 18:00 until 19:30. There are discos and football and netball are played.
